sentences.en: "Could you photocopy the advert and put it in the post to us?"— 'With pleasure John.'
sentences.cn: “你能把广告影印一下寄给我们吗？”——“当然可以，约翰。”

sentences.en: Advertising slots in soaps are expensive to purchase, but guarantee large numbers of viewers seeing the advert.
sentences.cn: 在肥皂剧中插播广告的费用非常昂贵，但能保证大批观众看到广告。

sentences.en: Each 10 second advert would have its own location a sequential playlist.
sentences.cn: 每十秒的广告在连续播放列表中要有自己的定位.

sentences.en: Experts said the plans would likely end of the traditional "one size fits all" advert break.
sentences.cn: 专家表示，该计划有望打破传统的“一刀切”式的广告播放模式。

sentences.en: For your viewing pleasure we have included a video clip of a Japanese advert for this abomination.
sentences.cn: 我们剪辑了一段日本广告的视频让您在视觉上感受这份深恶痛绝。

sentences.en: I saw an advert for a job with a large engineering company.
sentences.cn: 我看见一家大型工程公司的招聘广告。

sentences.en: It sounds like an advert: easy on the ear but bland and forgettable.
sentences.cn: 这听起来像广告词：听着简单易懂，但是枯燥乏味，容易忘记。

sentences.en: People should complain when they consider an advert offensive.
sentences.cn: 民众如果认为某个广告具有冒犯性就应该投诉。

sentences.en: Please advert to the contents below, I believe you won't be disappointed.
sentences.cn: 敬请留意后面的内容, 相信您一定不会失望的.

sentences.en: She answered an advert for a job as a cook.
sentences.cn: 她应聘了厨师的招聘广告.

sentences.en: She came across and advert for the book Bible Basics.
sentences.cn: 她偶然留意到圣经基础这本书.

sentences.en: The advert featured a dolphin swimming around a goldfish bowl.
sentences.cn: 该广告的內容为一条在金鱼缸里游动的海豚.

sentences.en: The advert should only be shown after the 9pm watershed.
sentences.cn: 这则广告只能在晚上9点成人节目开始后才能播出。

sentences.en: The music sounds like an advert—easy on the ear but bland and forgettable.
sentences.cn: 这音乐听起来像是广告——悦耳但是毫无特点，听过就忘。

sentences.en: This staggeringly offensive advert is attracting outrage on both the Chinese and wider web, with users blasting it for being racist.
sentences.cn: 这则令人吃惊的攻击性广告，被认为带为严重的种族歧视，引起了国内外各大媒体的愤怒。

sentences.en: Times you want your advert to go on air.
sentences.cn: 你想你的时候到空中广告.

sentences.en: Use the power of sound for your TV advert or film.
sentences.cn: 声音成就了电影.在您的电视广告或电影中感受声音的力量.

sentences.en: Your best hope of obtaining a copy is to place an advert in the classifieds.
sentences.cn: 要想搞到这本书，你最好在分类广告栏刊登个广告。

sentences.en: Your CV is your advert to sell yourself to an employer.
sentences.cn: 你的CV[ 个人履历表]就是将你推销给雇主的媒介.
